title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to Russell Westbrook and his agent parting ways after 14 season and what this says about the former MVP at this point in his career. He tells you exactly which quarterback is the NFL's most underrated player. He tells you why he was right about Kevin Durant and wrong about Lamar Jackson. Plus, Super Bowl Champion Will Blackmon joins the show to discuss the expectations for Tom Brady and the Buccaneers after Brady's short retirement this offseason. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
